H0.text: who has the most all star mvp awards. Kareem Abdul-Jabbar

H1.text: who has the most all star mvp awards. LeBron James

H2.text: who has the most all star mvp awards. Michael Jordan

H3.text: who has the most all star mvp awards. Bob Pettit

A4.text: Kareem Abdul-Jabbar has the distinction of playing in the most All-Star Games (18) without winning the All-Star Game MVP.

A5.text: Oscar Robertson, Michael Jordan, Shaquille O'Neal, and LeBron James have each won the award three times.
